Package io.amcp.examples.weather

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    StandaloneWeatherCollector
    Standalone Weather Collector Agent that fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap API.
    WeatherCollectorAgent
    Weather collector agent that retrieves real-time weather data from OpenWeatherMap API every 5 minutes for multiple locations.
    WeatherCollectorAgentTest
    Simple test class to verify WeatherCollectorAgent functionality
    WeatherConsumerAgent
    Configurable weather consumer agent that monitors weather data and generates alerts based on configurable thresholds.
    WeatherData
    Immutable weather data model representing current weather conditions for a specific location.
    WeatherData.Builder  
    WeatherDemo
    Demo script to show the weather system working with Nice, France
    WeatherRealTimeMonitor
    Real-time monitoring tool to verify weather data collection every 5 minutes and OpenWeatherMap API key functionality.
    WeatherSystemIntegrationTest
    Integration test and validation for the Weather System implementation.
    WeatherSystemLauncher
    Simple standalone launcher for the Weather Collector system.
    WeatherSystemServer
    Weather System orchestration server that manages multiple weather agents, provides CLI interface, and coordinates the entire weather monitoring system.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WeatherData.AlertLevel
